UML:TaggedValue.value: Complex rules will be edited by editing the rule's drl in a text editor

Simple rules should be edited via a graphical editor including:
  • Operators
  • Date handling (before, after, etc.)
  • Business Object population

The user should be able to activate/deactivate the rules present in the system. When a rule is being deactivated the system should notify the user if the rule being deactivated is currently in use and give them the option to proceed with the deactivation or cancel it.

UML:ClassifierRole.name: REQ004 - Convert simple to complex rule

UML:TaggedValue.value: The user should be able to convert a simple rule to a complex one after which point they will no longer be able to edit it via the graphical editor, but only by editing the rule's drl. Conversion is strictly one-way (a complex rule cannot be converted back to a simple rule).
The user should be able to view all places where a specific rule is currently used (workflows, forms, etc.)
REQ004 - Convert simple to complex rule
REQ004 - Convert simple to complex rule
